import { Component, inject, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { ActivatedRoute } from '@angular/router'; @Component({ selector: 'app-folder', templateUrl: './folder.page.html', styleUrls: ['./folder.page.scss'], }) export class FolderPage implements OnInit { public folder!: string; private activatedRoute = inject(ActivatedRoute); constructor() {} ngOnInit() { this.folder = this.activatedRoute.snapshot.paramMap.get('id') as string; } } {{ folder }} {{ folder }}
